articles.author: Suman Naishadham
articles.title: What we know about Monday’s sweeping power outage in Spain and Portugal - AP News
articles.description: The sweeping power outage that hit Spain and Portugal this week has raised questions about the electricity grid in a region not normally known for blackouts. Monday’s outage, one of the worst ever in Europe, started in the afternoon and lasted through nightfa…
articles.content:
MADRID (AP) The sweeping power outage that hit Spain and Portugal this week has raised questions about the electricity grid in a region not normally known for blackouts.
